title: Dr Zakir Naik's Dawah Tour to Nigeria 2023
transcript: [Music] it's a great pleasure and honor for me to give a speech in the heart of Africa my dream has come true I'm giving a public lecture in Nigeria this religion of peace submittable to almighty God is the only solution for the problems of humankind Islam does not only speak about Unity it practically demonstrates Unity every day in our life at least five times a day during our Salah so the only solution for the global Unity is believing and worshiping only one Soul Creator and [Music] sustainer
